name: MDLColorSwatchTexture
desc: A generator of texel data that creates a gradient between two specified colors.

items.name: init(colorGradientFrom: CGColor, to: CGColor, name: String?, textureDimensions: vector_int2)
items.desc: Initializes a texture that creates a vertical gradient between two colors.

items.name: init(colorTemperatureGradientFrom: Float, toColorTemperature: Float, name: String?, textureDimensions: vector_int2)
items.desc: Initializes a texture that creates a vertical gradient between two color temperatures.
